argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mat1rhmval.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | mat1rhmval.a | |- A = ( { E } Mat R ) |
| 3 |  | mat1rhmval.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 4 |  | mat1rhmval.o | |- O = <. E , E >. |
| 5 |  | mat1rhmval.f | |- F = ( x e. K |-> { <. O , x >. } ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_mat1f1o | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V ) -> F : K -1-1-onto-> B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_f1of | |- ( F : K -1-1-onto-> B -> F : K --> B ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V ) -> F : K --> B ) |
